title: Rewards Guardian (Mage Training Arena)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Rewards Guardian is the owner of the Mage Training Arena reward shop and can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US]. The shop exchanges pizazz points for magic-related items in the Mage Training Arena minigame. It is the only way to obtain infinity items, wands, and mage's book (aside from trading with players who have already earned them). It is also the only way to obtain the Bones to Peaches spell. Players must acquire the appropriate number of pizazz points in each of the four rooms to buy items from the Rewards Guardian.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Rewards Guardian

NPC ID5984

The Rewards Guardian is the owner of the Mage Training Arena reward shop and can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US]. The shop exchanges pizazz points for magic-related items in the Mage Training Arena minigame. It is the only way to obtain infinity items, wands, and mage's book (aside from trading with players who have already earned them). It is also the only way to obtain the Bones to Peaches spell. Players must acquire the appropriate number of pizazz points in each of the four rooms to buy items from the Rewards Guardian.

[[File:Rewards Guardian (Mage Training Arena) chathead.png|left]]
The '''Rewards Guardian''' is the owner of the [[Mage Training Arena]] reward shop and can be found on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}}. The shop exchanges [[pizazz points]] for magic-related items in the Mage Training Arena minigame. It is the only way to obtain [[Infinity robes|infinity items]], [[wand]]s, and [[mage's book]] (aside from trading with players who have already earned them). It is also the only way to obtain the [[Bones to Peaches]] spell. Players must acquire the appropriate number of [[pizazz points]] in each of the four rooms to buy items from the Rewards Guardian.
